pullrequest.title: Added optional start/stop/reset buttons to the timer GUI plugin

content.raw:
Interesting stuff happens when I resize the timer buttons:

![timergui.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/jgXqbo/images/1944870569-timergui.png)

The buttons shrink, while the timer gets cut off. Maybe this could be made consistent (though I know resizing in Qt is kind of a pain).
content.html:
Interesting stuff happens when I resize the timer buttons:

The buttons shrink, while the timer gets cut off. Maybe this could be made consistent (though I know resizing in Qt is kind of a pain).
